thread.title: COLIN
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by COLIN

author: COLIN
title: COLIN
text:
When I book a car I find it important to advise them exactly what you want.
when you state the important conditions that you would be looking for I have found them very competitive, even if you have to go back if you find them the first Quote: not competitive, they will listen.
The cars I have found very good, I will continue to be a supportive customer.
